title: ‘It’s a New Chapter in More Ways Than One’: Tao Geoghegan Hart and His Tour de France Quest
content:
Leap of Faith: Just months after breaking his hip, the 2020 Giro d'Italia winner will be at an unknown level in his Lidl-Trek debut.

Read the full article at ‘It’s a New Chapter in More Ways Than One’: Tao Geoghegan Hart and His Tour de France Quest on Velo.
author: ahood
